title: What is the best strategy going into 2020
body:
I want to know how to deal with people talking to teammates and causing them to stop playing the game in the middle of a match. 
I find this to be something I don't understand nor do I like when it happens on my team. So far having tested out and played this game, the core game is fun but kind of slow, but if I am going to dedicate 20-40 minutes of my life to a game, all the players should try to win so they are not wasting other people's time.
